name: web-spider
short_description:
web spider program, developed by VC++ 6.0.  can crawl internet and retrieve plenty of information with very high speed. With you can download network resources, such as html/xml files, audio/vedio binaries and binary documentations to local hard disks.


Following characteristic are designed with web spider: 
High performance of crawling and downloading 
Wide scope of target network resources and configurable 
Multi-threads-enable downloading mechanism and asynchronous DNS querying 
Crawling with depth-priority algorithm 
Configurable crawling target: single site, sites in company or whole Internet
